name: Translation Reports (XLATN)
tag_list: translation, globalization, internationalization, international, localization, multilingual, bilingual, spanish
overview:
Translation Reports (xlatn.com) is a buyers guide and consultancy for translation and localization technology and services.

The guide reviews and explains translation products and technologies in terms that people outside the translation industry can understand, with an emphasis on emerging technologies and business practices. The guide also includes tutorials about a range of topics.

The target audience are developers and business managers who know they need to make their company and products accessible outside of English, but are not career translation industry people (e.g. most small and midsize businesses). The guide and associated consultancy provide clients with a concise and objective overview of available products and technologies, best practices, and techniques for building multilingual services.
